description: Provides an overview of Romania, including key events and facts about this European country
title: Romania country profile
maintext: A former army chief of staff, Mr Ciuca has little political experience but is a close ally of President Iohannis.The centrist and pro-European National Liberal Party took office in November 2019 after the divided and scandal-ridden Social Democratic government lost a parliamentary confidence vote, but struggled to form a coalition among parties that shared little but opposition to the Social Democrats.
